Test Name: Low-Grade Fibromyxoid Sarcoma (LGFMS) 16p11.2 (FUS or TLS) Rearrangement, FISH
Purpose: To detect 16p11.2 (FUS or TLS) gene rearrangements associated with Low-Grade Fibromyxoid Sarcoma in tissue specimens via fluorescence in situ hybridization.
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged glass slide
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope, hybridization oven, water bath, microtome, thermocycler
